snippet: Anja Reschke, a German broadcaster, blamed a recent spate of “hateful Internet tirades” for inciting real-world violence against refugees.
lead_paragraph: Anja Reschke, a German broadcaster, blamed a recent spate of “hateful Internet tirades” for inciting real-world violence against refugees.

headline.print_headline: German Journalist Wades Into Online War Over Refugees
